title: Comparative study of physical education pedagogies: Exploring learner-centered approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge and practical experience in physical education theory
context.additional_context: A comparative analysis of physical education methodologies applicable to professional practitioners' work.

learning_goals: They can explain the theoretical foundations and key differences between Teaching Games for Understanding (TGfU) and Conceptual Learning Approach (CLA).
Learners can propose three or more physical education design strategies utilizing a learner-centered approach
Learners can demonstrate constraint analysis and iterative game design methods applicable to real educational scenarios
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
